item.title: Allison add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Allison add a quote by Julian of Norwich
item.description: "All shall be well, and all shall be well and all manner of thing shall be well." -- Julian of Norwich

item.title: Allison add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "And the day came when the risk to remain tight in a bud was more painful than the risk it took to blossom." -- Anais Nin

item.title: Allison add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Allison add a quote by Charles M. Schulz
item.description: "All you need is love. But a little chocolate now and then doesn't hurt." -- Charles M. Schulz

item.title: Allison add a quote by Scott Adams
item.description: "Creativity is allowing yourself to make mistakes. Art is knowing which ones to keep." -- Scott Adams

item.title: Allison add a quote by Paul Terry
item.description: "Whenever I feel the need to exercise, I lie down until it goes away." -- Paul Terry

item.title: Allison add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Loyalty to country ALWAYS. Loyalty to government, when it deserves it." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Allison add a quote by John Milton
item.description: "The mind is its own place, and in itself can make a heaven of hell, a hell of heaven.." -- John Milton

item.title: Allison add a quote by Howard Zinn
item.description: "Let us in the name of the Holy Trinity go on sending all the slaves that can be sold." -- Howard Zinn

item.title: Allison add a quote by Laurel Thatcher Ulrich
item.description: "Well-behaved women seldom make history." -- Laurel Thatcher Ulrich

item.title: Allison add a quote by Walt Disney
item.description: "I would rather entertain and hope that people learned something than educate people and hope they were entertained" -- Walt Disney

item.title: Allison add a quote by Anne Morrow Lindbergh
item.description: "Good communication is as stimulating as black coffee and just as hard to sleep after." -- Anne Morrow Lindbergh
